name: StatusVol 2
author: fidele007
description:
Tested on iOS 9.3.3-10.2.

An updated and hopefully bug-free version of StatusVol 2. No new features will be included or should be expected. All credits to Steve Rolfe who brought this tweak to life.

GitHub link.

0.8 (2016-01-04): Fix crashing bug in landscape mode if dynamic colors are enabled
0.9 (2016-01-04): Fix status bar time not hiding when Hide Time is enabled
0.9-4 (2016-01-10): An attempt to fix crashing bug when changing volume on lock screen
0.9-7 (2016-01-10): Disable dynamic colors on lock screen in an attempt to fix crashing bug on lock screen
